subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Perry Jones will miss the first five games next season if he stays at Baylor after an N.C.A.A. reinstatement committee upheld an earlier ruling that declared him ineligible.
snippet: Perry Jones will miss the first five games next season if he stays at Baylor after an N.C.A.A. reinstatement committee upheld an earlier ruling that declared him ineligible.
